Principal House.name: Principal House
Principal House.description: You're in the Principal House. A statue of a hideous Nian towers above you.

Side Room.name: Side Room
Side Room.description: You're in the Side Room. Before you lies a staff, cracking the earth around it.

Western Wing House.name: Western Wing House
Western Wing House.description: You're in the Western Wing House.

Eastern Wing House.name: Eastern Wing House
Eastern Wing House.description: You're in the Eastern Wing House. You remember how you used to lounge around with friends and family, enjoying

Opposite House.name: Opposite House
Opposite House.description: You're in the Opposite House. Is it opposite day today?

Screen Wall.name: Screen Wall
Screen Wall.description: You're in the Screen Wall. There's a large mural of a dragon missing an eye.

Gatehouse.name: Gatehouse
Gatehouse.description: You're in the Gatehouse. It feels a little empty in here; the gate could use some decor.

Main Street.name: Main Street
Main Street.description: You're in the Main Street. A couple kids are kicking a Jianzi on the side of the road.

Neighbor's House.name: Neighbor's House
Neighbor's House.description: You knock on the door, but no one answers. Pay me $5.99 for this extension pack.

Market.name: Market
Market.description: You're in the Market. Something about the bustling atmosphere makes you feel at home.

Temple.name: Temple
Temple.description: You're in the Temple. There's a holy energy emenating from the grandiose painting on the walls.

Temple Courtyard.name: Temple Courtyard
Temple Courtyard.description: You're in the Temple Courtyard. Thousands of years of history line the tiling beneath your feet.

Temple Garden.name: Temple Garden
Temple Garden.description: You're in the Temple Garden. You see a beautiful peach blossom tree standing next to a pond.

Cemetery.name: Cemetery
Cemetery.description:
You're in the Cemetery. 
It's dark and dreary out here; you feel the weight of a thousand dead souls looming.
